Summary: It hovered over my house, flew away, and came back, and flew off into the distant and was just a little ball of white-blue light
divs: sighting detailsi was in the living room and noticed the light in a mirror. it was very bright so i ran out on the deck and saw it. the ufo looked like a ball of white\blue light. it hovered over the house, then flew off and circled back then it flew off into the distance and looked like an airplane light 5x the size and then it disappeared, then i could see the light again and then it disappeared again. it was weird really weird. i just want to know if anyone else saw it, so i don't feel so crazy. i live 5 minutes away from fyffe, al (the ufo capital of the world and home to the annual ufo festival)
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rainsville
This sighting has never been favorited.
